string.text:
Pistol cartridge with a lead-cored bullet is designed to engage unprotected enemy manpower, in protective equipment without metal protective plates. The cartridge consists of a lead core in a bimetallic sheath.
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR2 (23) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]32

Pistol cartridge with an expansive bullet designed to destroy unprotected enemy manpower and to fire in confined spaces.
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR1 (15) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]60
